How do I send files with LanXchange?
Just tap the + Button. Then select the file(s) you want to share. Thats it! All other devices in your local network can now use LanXchange to download the shared file.
How do I receive files with LanXchange?

Just start the app! LanXchange will automatically discover other devices in your local network running LanXchange and display all files that are shared by them. Just tap the file you want to download.
Files from other devices don\'t show up!

1. Be patient! Files take up to 20 seconds on some devices to appear. 
2. Make sure that all devices have Wifi enabled and are connected to the same network. 
3. Keeping the app open and the screen turned on also improves detection.
4. Check that no firewall prevents LanXchange from accessing the network.
5. Sharing between PC and Android? Starting the PC version first usually works better.
6. Some devices offer a setting for wifi power-saving (in the wifi menu). Try turning that off, it doesn't save too much power, anyway.
7. LanXchange is designed for small (home) networks. Big company or university networks may be too large for devices to find each other.

All files are saved to the internal memory of your device (also known as internal SD-Card). Look out for the \"download\" folder. LanXchange also notifies Android about received files, so they should apper in all your apps.
Can I share multiple files at once?

Yes. If you have Android 4.3 (Jelly Bean M2) or higher, you can use the normal + button for this. Tap and hold a file to enable multi-selection. On older devices, you need to install a file manager/explorer app. Then, select multiple files there and choose \"Share\" and then \"LanXchange\"
What kind of files can I share with LanXchange?

Basically everything that is a file and that is stored locally on your phone. Files in cloud storage may or may not work, but even if they do keep in mind that they have to be downloaded in the background to be read by LanXchange and that may be slow.
I cannot select other files than images, videos and audio!

Lets say you want to share a .PDF file but the android file selector (the thing that pops up when you tap the + button) only offers images, videos and music. In this case, you can install a file manager/explorer from the store. Having such an app installed should allow you to use it for file selection - without type limitations. Another trick is to try sharing the file directly from another app. Most apps offer a \"Share with\" functionality - LanXchange should be one of the options.
Is it possible to save received files somewhere else?
Not yet. I may add this feature in the future, so write me a mail if you need it!
Can I use LanXchange to transfer files between different platforms? (e.g. PC to Android, Mac to Windows)
Where can I get the PC version?
Select "PC-Version" in the main menu (right where you selected "Help" to get here)
I tried everything, but I still cannot see files from other devices!
Sometimes restarting the app on both sides helps. If the problem persists, send me a mail! (Select About in the main menu)
I want feature XY, I found a bug.
Email me! Select "About" in the main menu.
